attributes.action: Make a TAX threshold for second income of £3000 before paying tax!
attributes.background: People now more than ever need to take a second income after there first income and have reached there £11,000 threshold for there first income. The tax on the second income of earning £500 is £100 tax paid, encouraging people to stick to one job and live a poorer life.

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
